name: Trade Skill Master
description: This will fetch the installer from the website and install it locally using the proper arguments/prefixes.
content:
script:
  files:
  - installer: http://cdn.tradeskillmaster.com/setup.exe
  game:
    exe: $GAMEDIR/prefix/drive_c/Games/tradeskillmaster/app/tradeskillmaster.exe
    working_dir: $GAMEDIR
  installer:
  - chmodx: installer
  - description: Installing tradeskillmaster...
    execute: null
    file: installer
